meanings.definition: Small scale-like structures found in grass flowers.
meanings.sent1: The lodicules help in the opening of grass flowers.
meanings.sent2: Botanists study the lodicules to understand grass flowers better.
meanings.sent3: The lodicules in the grass flowers were so tiny, they looked like mini shields.
meanings.sent4: The lodicules acted like tiny keys, unlocking the beauty of the grass flowers.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the lodicules appeared like delicate petals protecting the grass flowers.

meanings.definition: A pair of small, scale-like organs at the base of the ovary in certain flowers.
meanings.sent1: The lodicules at the base of the ovary provide support to certain flowers.
meanings.sent2: Gardeners carefully examine the lodicules to ensure the health of specific flowers.
meanings.sent3: The lodicules near the ovary seemed to be whispering secrets to the petals.
meanings.sent4: Like guardians, the lodicules stood watch at the base of the ovary, protecting the flower.
meanings.sent5: The lodicules resembled tiny shields, shielding the delicate ovary of the flower.
